entry.title: Favorites
entry.content:
Introduction

This is where your content starts. Since you are using Jekyll, you can use standard Markdown formatting.

Subheading Example

You can add lists, links, and text formatting easily:

  • Item one
  • Item two
  • Link to Google

Math and Code

Since you are studying Physics and CS, you will likely use these features often.

Code Blocks

To display code (like Python or C++), use triple backticks:

```python def hello_world(): print(“Hello, Physics!”)
entry.summary: A list of my favorite things
